channel.title: [508]Cannot Find a tut for making Doors Open and close :(
channel.description:
Okay so I have been using mithscape deleted a lot of junk from it and trying to just get the basics of doing stuff so i have open the file.
Object1Option1
Which contains my doors (Bandos boss and armadly Boss Doors)
I have found them in the folder i just want to add a new home but its inside a castle so i need to learn how to open doors to get inside.
Its a mithscape palidino76 base.
EDIT: IF anyone knows how to delete doors then that is fine i have added the stuff in but cannot find the objects id's.
Its in lumbridge castle the large doors that go into the eating hall
Help is very appreciated Thanks
